items.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Citigroup, Abercrombie, Vistra, Duolingo and more
items.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

items.title: Trump targets credit card rates. What’s at stake for Capital One and other banks
items.description: Capital One shares sank Monday after Trump called for a 10% cap on credit card rates, a major profit driver for the company.

items.title: Trump's credit card rate cap plan has unclear path, 'devastating' risks, bank insiders say
items.description: A 10% rate cap would make large swaths of the credit card industry unprofitable, especially tied to customers with less-than-ideal credit, banks say.

items.title: Republican Sen. Thom Tillis vows to block Trump's Fed nominees following Powell probe
items.description: Trump will face an important obstacle — from within his own party — as he seeks to replace Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.

items.title: Yellen says Powell probe 'extremely chilling' for Fed independence, market should be concerned
items.description: Former Fed Chair Janet Yellen spoke Monday to CNBC about a Department of Justice investigation into current Chair Jerome Powell.
